jsonquotesarr.quote: Time you enjoy wasing, was not wasted.
jsonquotesarr.author: John Lennon

jsonquotesarr.quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment.
jsonquotesarr.author: Mark Twain

jsonquotesarr.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
jsonquotesarr.author: Carol Burnett

jsonquotesarr.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
jsonquotesarr.author: Nelson Mandela

jsonquotesarr.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
jsonquotesarr.author: Walt Disney

jsonquotesarr.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
jsonquotesarr.author: Dalai Lama

jsonquotesarr.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
jsonquotesarr.author: W. Clement Stone

jsonquotesarr.quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
jsonquotesarr.author: Thomas A. Edison

jsonquotesarr.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
jsonquotesarr.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

jsonquotesarr.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
jsonquotesarr.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
